bibl.title: Observations on the Katabasis of P. Fayum 2 (P. Brit. Mus. 1192). English Translation by Patrick Roca.
bibl.note: 1. P. Fay. 2 [= P. lit. Lond. 240 (= M.-P.3 1923; van Haelst 1066; LDAB 5049)]: A hymn, an aretalogy or a lyrical narrative poem? - 2. Magic fishing with the hair of a corpse. - 3. Magic and nekuia. - Pp. 156-159: Appendix [text of the papyrus]. - Avec résumé en anglais.

bibl.title: Mito y magia en Grecia y Roma

bibl.seg: Jaume Pòrtulas, Observations on the Katabasis of P. Fayum 2 (P. Brit. Mus. 1192). English Translation by Patrick Roca.
Emilio Suárez de la Torre & Aurelio Pérez Jiménez (edd.), Mito y magia en Grecia y Roma = Supplementa Μήνη. 1 (Barcelona, 2013) pp. 149-160.

1. P. Fay. 2 [= P. lit. Lond. 240 (= M.-P.3 1923; van Haelst 1066; LDAB 5049)]: A hymn, an aretalogy or a lyrical narrative poem? - 2. Magic fishing with the hair of a corpse. - 3. Magic and nekuia. - Pp. 156-159: Appendix [text of the papyrus]. - Avec résumé en anglais.
